Class tripleplay.anim.Animator

The superclass changed from java.lang.Object to tripleplay.anim.AnimBuilder.

Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Removed Methods
Action add(GroupLayer, Layer) Adds the supplied child to the supplied parent.
Action addAt(GroupLayer, Layer, float, float) Adds the supplied child to the supplied parent at the specified translation.
Action addAt(GroupLayer, Layer, XY) Adds the supplied child to the supplied parent at the specified translation.
Flip flipbook(GroupLayer, Flipbook) Starts a flipbook animation in a new image layer which is created and added to {@code box}.
Flip flipbook(ImageLayer, Flipbook) Starts a flipbook animation that displays in {@code layer}.
Animation flipbookAt(GroupLayer, float, float, Flipbook) Starts a flipbook animation that displays the supplied {@code book} at the specified position in the supplied parent.
Animation flipbookAt(GroupLayer, XY, Flipbook) Starts a flipbook animation that displays the supplied {@code book} at the specified position in the supplied parent.
Action play(Sound) Plays the supplied sound.
Action play(Playable) Plays the supplied clip or loop.
Action stop(Sound) Stops the supplied sound from playing.
Action stop(Playable) Stops the supplied clip or loop.
One tweenVolume(Sound) Tweens the volumne of the supplied sound.
One tweenVolume(Playable) Tweens the volumne of the supplied playable.
 

Changed Methods
Action action(Runnable) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Creates an animation that executes the supplied runnable and immediately completes.
Animator create() Now deprecated.
 Just construct Animator directly now.
Delay delay(float) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Creates an animation that delays for the specified number of seconds.
Action destroy(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Destroys the specified layer.
Action increment(Value<Integer>, int) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Increments (or decrements if {@code amount} is negative} an int value.
Action reparent(GroupLayer, Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Reparents the supplied child to the supplied new parent.
AnimBuilder repeat(Layer) Change in return type from Animator to AnimBuilder.
Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. 		Returns a builder which can be used to construct an animation that will be repeated until the supplied layer has been removed from its parent.
Action setDepth(Layer, float) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Sets the specified layer's depth to the specified value.
Action setValue(Value<T>, T) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Sets a value to the supplied constant.
Action setVisible(Layer, boolean) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Sets the specified layer to visible or not.
Shake shake(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Creates a shake animation on the specified layer.
One tween(Value) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween using the supplied custom value.
One tweenAlpha(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's transparency.
One tweenRotation(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's rotation.
One tweenScale(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x/y-scale.
One tweenScaleX(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x-scale.
Two tweenScaleXY(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x/y-scale.
One tweenScaleY(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's y-scale.
Two tweenTranslation(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x/y-translation.
One tweenX(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x-translation.
Two tweenXY(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x/y-translation.
One tweenY(Layer) Method was locally defined, but is now inherited from AnimBuilder. Starts a tween on the supplied layer's y-translation.
Animation add(Animation) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Registers an animation with this animator.
